import logo from './logo.svg'; import {useState,useEffect} from 'react'; import './App.css'; import Login from './components/Login' import Homepage from './components/Homepage' function App() { const [isLogin,setLogin] = useState(false); const handleLogin = (event) => { event.preventDefault() let {uid,pass} = document.forms[0] Login({uid: uid.value, pass: pass.value}) setLogin(true) console.log("login ",isLogin) } const handleLogout = (event) => { sessionStorage.setItem("isLoggedin",false) setLogin(false) console.log("login ",isLogin) } return (
{(isLogin==false) ? <>

Welcome to MeriBasket





: <> }
); } export default App;
